pr_title: Create Java code sample for omit finding with substring using custom detector

timeline.bodyText:
It would be nice if you were more specific here and say what might happen and how they might mitigate it.
https://google.github.io/styleguide/javaguide.html#s6.2-caught-exceptions
timeline.author: lesv

replies.bodyText:
This is copied from existing parallel sample code. I agree that it's pretty crappy, and we're also not really consistent: sometimes we do this, sometimes we just stick a "throws " on the function.
Of the two I think I prefer the latter, it makes it clear that what the code is explicitly not handling. Can I fix this in a follow-up for all our DLP Java samples? (see internal bug b/158239329)
replies.author: sushicw
